docs.snippet: BENVENUTO It's celebration time for the 20th consecutive year at Mama Leone's. Starting tonight, the pink stucce facade of the popular restaurant in the theater district will be adorned with multicolored lights heralding the pre-Lenten fiesta insi...
docs.lead_paragraph: BENVENUTO It's celebration time for the 20th consecutive year at Mama Leone's. Starting tonight, the pink stucce facade of the popular restaurant in the theater district will be adorned with multicolored lights heralding the pre-Lenten fiesta inside, at 239 West 48th Street, between Broadway and Eighth Avenue.

docs.abstract: Article on Amer Indians' struggle for power discusses Peter MacDonald's efforts, through Council of Energy Resources Tribes, to improve terms of contracts for Teasing of coal lands in West; Indians believe that group cannot do worse job for them than Bur of Indian Affairs has done; illus (M)

docs.snippet: As Fats Waller might have put it, the joint is really jumpin' at Club Mediterranee's vacation village on the island of Guadeloupe, where a series of jazz programs is being presented, but those who want to catch the performances had better jump, to...
docs.lead_paragraph: As Fats Waller might have put it, the joint is really jumpin' at Club Mediterranee's vacation village on the island of Guadeloupe, where a series of jazz programs is being presented, but those who want to catch the performances had better jump, too, for the weekly series will run only through April.

headline.main: Le Jazz Hot Reigns at Caribbean Club Med
